question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term describes a character who is in direct juxtaposition to another character and serves to highlight the characteristics of the other individual?
description: The image shows three children sitting side by side on a couch. Each child is holding up a colorful drawing in front of their face. The drawings depict different characters with various expressions and features. The child on the left is holding a red drawing, the middle child is holding a yellow drawing, and the child on the right is holding a green drawing. The children are dressed in bright, casual clothing.
